fno: Turnover on the National Stock Exchange's futures & options (F&O) segment was Rs 290.47 lakh crore compared with Rs 212.26 lakh crore reported in the previous session. In the cash market, the Nifty 50 lost 111 points or 0.65% to settle at 17,043.30. The NSE's India VIX, a gauge of market's expectation of volatility over the near term, added 0.01% to 16.22. Adani Enterprises, RIL and ICICI Bank were the top traded individual stock futures contracts in F&O segment of NSE. The March 2023 F&O contracts will expire on 29 March 2023.
